Knife-themed restaurant: A restaurant that serves dishes inspired by the different types of knives, such as a "Bread Knife" burger with a bun shaped like a bread knife, or a "Chef's Knife" salad with a bed of mixed greens and toppings arranged in a pattern resembling a chef's knife. Knife-making workshop: A workshop where participants can learn the art of knife-making, from selecting the right materials to shaping and sharpening the blade. Participants can take home their handmade knife as a souvenir. Confidence score: 0.9

Knife-themed escape room: An escape room where participants are "trapped" in a room filled with knives of all shapes and sizes. They must use their problem-solving skills to find clues and solve puzzles to escape before time runs out. Confidence score: 0.8

Knife-based fitness class: A fitness class that incorporates knives into the workout. Participants will use lightweight knives to perform various exercises, such as knife-themed yoga poses or knife-based martial arts moves. Confidence score: 0.7

Knife-themed video game: A video game where players take on the role of a knife-wielding warrior, battling enemies and navigating through levels filled with obstacles and challenges. The game could include different types of knives with unique abilities and upgrades. Confidence score: 0.9
